ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Approved__c, "Yes"), $Profile.Name <> 'Project Team Leader', $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name <> 'Salesforce Admin', $Profile.Name <> 'Executive Admin', $Profile.Name <> 'Digital Project Manager', $Profile.Name <> 'Agency Director', $Profile.Name <> 'Social Media Manager', $Profile.Name <> 'Project Team Member', $Profile.Name <> 'Accounting Generalist')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: DO NOT HAVE PRIVILEGE TO APPROVE
